title: City & Community - Reconceptualizing Segregation in the Global South
itunes:title: City & Community - Reconceptualizing Segregation in the Global South
description: Guest Editor and author Marco Garrido discusses his special issue "Global South" and his article, "Reconceptualizing Segregation in the Global South," published in the March 2021 issue of City & Community.
content:encoded: Guest Editor and author Marco Garrido discusses his special issue "Global South" and his article, "Reconceptualizing Segregation in the Global South," published in the March 2021 issue of City & Community.
itunes:subtitle: Guest Editor and author Marco Garrido discusses his special issue "Global South" and his article, "Reconceptualizing Segregation in the Global South," published in the March 2021 issue of City & Community.
